newsitem.title: RUSSIA: FORECAST - Russia Oct inflation 1.2 pct - government.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST - Russia Oct inflation 1.2 pct - government.

text.p: Russia's October inflation will rise to 1.2 percent from 0.3 percent in September, if the current price trend continues, the State Statistics Committee said on Wednesday.
Inflation in the week ended October 21 was unchanged from the previous week's level of 0.2 percent, it said.
Inflation in the first 21 days of October was 0.8 percent, compared with 0.3 percent in the whole of September.
Since the start of the year prices have risen by 17.5 percent, it said.
RUSSIAN CONSUMER PRICES w/e Oct 21 w/e Oct 14
